info.title: Cubicle Shooter
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Cubicle Shooter is an FPS with a destructible environment.

Controls:
Pointer = Aim
Analog stick = Move
A button = Stop turning
B button = Shoot
C button = Jump
Z button = Crouch
- button = Load
+ button = Save

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com

music (Homeless) by Julien Lussiez
